auctionDebt().details: We can only auction debt that is not already being auctioned and is not locked in the debt queue

returns._id: Id of the debt auction that was started

auctionSurplus().details: We can only auction surplus if we wait at least 'surplusDelay' seconds since the last         surplus auction trigger, if we keep enough surplus in the buffer and if there is no bad debt left to settle

returns._id: the Id of the surplus auction that was started

returns._authorized: Whether the account is authorized or not

params._rad: Amount of coins/debt to destroy (number with 45 decimals)

params._data: Encoded data to modify the parameter
params._param: String identifier of the parameter to modify

params._cType: String identifier of the collateral to modify
params._data: Encoded data to modify the parameter
params._param: String identifier of the parameter to modify

popDebtFromQueue(uint256).details: A block of debt can be popped from the queue after popDebtDelay seconds have passed since it was           added there

params._debtBlockTimestamp: Timestamp of the block of debt that should be popped out

pushDebtToQueue(uint256).details: Debt is locked in a queue to give the system enough time to auction collateral         and gather surplus

settleDebt(uint256).details: We can only destroy debt that is not locked in the queue and also not in a debt auction

params._rad: Amount of coins/debt to destroy (number with 45 decimals)

transferExtraSurplus().details: We can only transfer surplus if we wait at least 'surplusDelay' seconds since the last           transfer, if we keep enough surplus in the buffer and if there is no bad debt left to settle

transferPostSettlementSurplus().details: Transfer any remaining surplus after disableCooldown seconds have passed since disabling the contract

auctionDebt().notice: Start a debt auction (print protocol tokens in exchange for coins so that the         system can be recapitalized)

authorizedAccounts(address).notice: Checks whether an account is authorized

cancelAuctionedDebtWithSurplus(uint256).notice: Use surplus coins to destroy debt that was in a debt auction

modifyParameters(bytes32,bytes).notice: Set a new value for a global specific parameter

modifyParameters(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Set a new value for a collateral specific parameter

popDebtFromQueue(uint256).notice: Pop a block of bad debt from the debt queue

pushDebtToQueue(uint256).notice: Push a block of bad debt to the debt queue

settleDebt(uint256).notice: Destroy an equal amount of coins and bad debt

transferExtraSurplus().notice: Send surplus to an address as an alternative to surplus auctions

transferPostSettlementSurplus().notice: Transfer any remaining surplus after the disable cooldown has passed. Meant to be a backup in case GlobalSettlement.processSAFE              has a bug, governance doesn't have power over the system and there's still surplus left in the AccountingEngine              which then blocks GlobalSettlement.setOutstandingCoinSupply.

unqueuedUnauctionedDebt().notice: Returns the amount of bad debt that is not in the debtQueue and is not currently handled by debt auctions

documentation.text: @notice Returns the amount of bad debt that is not in the debtQueue and is not currently handled by debt auctions

@notice Use surplus coins to destroy debt that was in a debt auction
 @param _rad Amount of coins/debt to destroy (number with 45 decimals)
